p: Since TAG composition determines oil quality as well as many important oil characteristics, its analysis in oilseed crops is of special interest. Previous works in which TAG composition of seeds in different sunflower lines have been studied [ 17, 18]. The knowledge on the content and composition of TAGs in the oil is essential for improving its TAG composition, optimization of the physicochemical properties, and enhancement of the nutritional value of edible oil as well as its industrial properties [ 19].
